document_data.name: The Honored Mamluk Society
document_data.mainbody: The '''Honored Mamluk Society''', also known as the '''Honored''', was a military organization in [[Zakhara]].{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|21}}
document_data.Activities: This [[mamluk]] organization was tasked with protecting the [[Khalil al-Assad al-Zahir|Grand Caliph]] and his harim.
document_data.Organization: The Honored were led by General [[Ahmahd abd al-Iffa]]. Mamluks of the Honored were either [[eunuch]]s or women.
document_data.Base of Operations: Since guarding the Grand Caliph was their priority, the Honored were based in [[Huzuz]] and actually rarely left the grounds of the [[Palace of the Enlightened Throne]] unless they were running errands.
